thread.section_title: Holiday Inn Express Manhattan Times Square South - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location!
thread.title_full: Great location! - Review of Holiday Inn Express Manhattan Times Square South, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Kathleen K
title: Great location!
text:
Stayed in 2 different Holiday Inns in NYC. They were less than a mile apart. This hotel"s facility was much nicer and the bed was much more comfy. Seemed like the rooms were bigger... but the city view wasn't as nice... nor was the breakfast or staff.
Request for a late checkout initially denied... after some back and forth they agreed... but didn't authorize the key... so it was a challenge..
Nice pub next door with nice drink and dinner special.
All in all I would stay here again!
